welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Franconville, a charming city known for its rich history and beautiful landscapes. We hope you enjoy your time here and take the opportunity to explore all that this lovely city has to offer!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Paris Cergy Pontoise Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Paris Cergy Pontoise Airport, mainly used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for all commercial flights at Le Bourget Airport.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: A separate terminal for private and executive flights, providing a more exclusive and personalized experience.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport, but may have limited coverage in some areas.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest and largest terminal at Charles De Gaulle Airport, serving mainly international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The second largest terminal at Charles De Gaulle Airport, divided into seven sub-terminals serving both international and domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The smallest terminal at Charles De Gaulle Airport, mainly serving low-cost airlines and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may have limited speed and data usage.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Toussus-le-noble Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Toussus-le-noble Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Orly Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Orly Airport, primarily serving low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi for up to 2 hours per day.
